author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: Dynamic module importing is one of the latest JavaScript features to hit the major browsers. In this article I'll demonstrate how you can build a lazy-load router with Vue.js that works natively in supported browsers. Without having to polyfill a module loading system, you can create this with just a few lines of code.
name: Build A Lazy-Load Router With Vue.js And The Lastest Browser Features
